title: What the Package Does (One Line, Title Case)
text: can install development version RTMBdist GitHub :

title: What the Package Does (One Line, Title Case)
text: basic example shows solve common problem: special using README.Rmd instead just README.md? can include R chunks like : ’ll still need render README.Rmd regularly, keep README.md --date. devtools::build_readme() handy . can also embed plots, example:  case, don’t forget commit push resulting figure files, display GitHub CRAN.
code: library(RTMBdist) ## basic example code summary(cars) #>      speed           dist        #>  Min.   : 4.0   Min.   :  2.00   #>  1st Qu.:12.0   1st Qu.: 26.00   #>  Median :15.0   Median : 36.00   #>  Mean   :15.4   Mean   : 42.98   #>  3rd Qu.:19.0   3rd Qu.: 56.00   #>  Max.   :25.0   Max.   :120.00

title: Reparametrised gamma distribution — gamma2
text: Density, distribution function, quantile function random generation gamma distribution reparametrised terms mean standard deviation.

title: Reparametrised gamma distribution — gamma2
code: dgamma2(x, mean = 1, sd = 1, log = FALSE)  pgamma2(q, mean = 1, sd = 1, lower.tail = TRUE, log.p = FALSE)  qgamma2(p, mean = 1, sd = 1, lower.tail = TRUE, log.p = FALSE)  rgamma2(n, mean = 1, sd = 1)

title: Reparametrised gamma distribution — gamma2
text: x, q vector quantiles mean mean parameter, must positive scalar. sd standard deviation parameter, must positive scalar. log, log.p logical; TRUE, probabilities/ densities \(p\) returned \(\log(p)\). lower.tail logical; TRUE, probabilities \(P[X <= x]\), otherwise, \(P[X > x]\). p vector probabilities n number observations. length(n) > 1, length taken number required.

title: Reparametrised gamma distribution — gamma2
text: dgamma2 gives density, pgamma2 gives distribution function, qgamma2 gives quantile function, rgamma2 generates random deviates.

title: Reparametrised gamma distribution — gamma2
text: implementation allows automatic differentiation RTMB.

title: Reparametrised gamma distribution — gamma2
code: x = rgamma2(1) d = dgamma2(x) p = pgamma2(x) q = qgamma2(p)

title: von Mises distribution — vm
text: Density, distribution function random generation von Mises distribution.

title: von Mises distribution — vm
code: dvm(x, mu = 0, kappa = 1, log = FALSE)  pvm(q, mu = 0, kappa = 1, from = NULL, tol = 1e-20)  rvm(n, mu = 0, kappa = 1, wrap = TRUE)

title: von Mises distribution — vm
text: x, q vector angles measured radians evaluate density function. mu mean direction distribution measured radians. kappa non-negative numeric value concentration parameter distribution. log logical; TRUE, densities returned log scale. value integration CDF starts. NULL, set mu - pi. tol precision evaluating distribution function n number observations. length(n) > 1, length taken number required. wrap logical; TRUE, generated angles wrapped interval -pi pi.

title: von Mises distribution — vm
text: dvm gives density, pvm gives distribution function, rvm generates random deviates.

title: von Mises distribution — vm
text: implementation dvm allows automatic differentiation RTMB. rvm pvm simply wrappers corresponding functions circular.

title: von Mises distribution — vm
code: set.seed(1) x = rvm(10, 0, 1) d = dvm(x, 0, 1) p = pvm(x, 0, 1)

title: wrapped Cauchy distribution — wrpcauchy
text: Density random generation wrapped Cauchy distribution.

title: wrapped Cauchy distribution — wrpcauchy
code: dwrpcauchy(x, mu = 0, rho, log = FALSE)  rwrpcauchy(n, mu = 0, rho, wrap = TRUE)

title: wrapped Cauchy distribution — wrpcauchy
text: x vector angles measured radians evaluate density function. mu mean direction distribution measured radians. rho concentration parameter distribution, must interval 0 1. log logical; TRUE, densities returned log scale. n number observations. length(n) > 1, length taken number required. wrap logical; TRUE, generated angles wrapped interval -pi pi.

title: wrapped Cauchy distribution — wrpcauchy
text: dwrpcauchy gives density rwrpcauchy generates random deviates.

title: wrapped Cauchy distribution — wrpcauchy
text: implementation dwrpcauchy allows automatic differentiation RTMB. rwrpcauchy simply wrapper rwrappedcauchyimported circular.

text: Package created
